about.text: For exchange we don't require neither login nor password and none of your personal data
We guarantee a special rate for the exchange of the amount 1 BTC and more
The exchange doesn't charge commission for buying/selling BTC, you pay only the network fee
The service works directly with blockchain wallets and doesn't keep your funds

limitExceededPopup.header: Exceeded the limit of available funds {currency}
limitExceededPopup.text1: We apologize for any inconvinience. Now is available {availableAmountIn} {currencyIn} = {availableAmountOut} {currencyOut}
limitExceededPopup.text2: You can place an order and the number of tokens you need will be automatically transferred to your account as the funds appear on the service.
